Writers: François Duhamel/Universal Pictures and DreamWorks Pictures
Headline: Photos: Oscars winners 2020
Article_Body: Best picture and best international feature film: "Parasite" Best actor: Joaquin Phoenix, "Joker" Best actress: Renée Zellweger ("Judy') Best director: Bong Joon Ho, "Parasite" Best supporting actor: Brad Pitt, "Once Upon a Time in Hollywood" Best supporting actress: Laura Dern, "Marriage Story" Best original screenplay: "Parasite" Best adapted screenplay: "Jojo Rabbit" Best animated feature film: "Toy Story 4" Best animated short film: "Hair Love" Best live action short film: "The Neighbors' Window" Best original song: "(I'm Gonna") Love Me Again" by Elton John and Bernie Taupin for the film "Rocketman" Best original score: Hildur Guðnadóttir, "Joker" Best production design: "Once Upon a Time in Hollywood" Best cinematography: "1917" Best costume design: "Little Women" Best makeup and hairstyling: "Bombshell" Best documentary feature: "American Factory" Best documentary, short subject: "Learning to Skateboard in a Warzone (If You're a Girl)" Best sound editing: "Ford v Ferrari" Best sound mixing: "1917" Best film editing: "Ford v Ferrari" Best visual effects: "1917"
